page.title: 10Birthday Barbecues
page.content: In the village of Norton, in the street of Cridling Gardens, it is customary to hold a party or barbecue on someone's birthday. Such barbecues are held in summer and the custom arose one summer when all the families were outside,talking, and my Mother said it was her 40th birthday so we held a barbecue to celebrate. If it is a barbecue then we eat the food outside the person's house but if it is a party with alcohol then we hold it in the house. Our barbecue food includes sausages, bacon, beefburgers, with salad and pitta bread. All are invited to come but if someone cannot attend the party we take some alcohol to their house so they are not left out.
